title: Campus Tour and Welcome
description: Guided tour for new students showcasing key campus areas, followed by a welcome session with university representatives.

description: Orientation event introducing international students to campus facilities, academic programs, and cultural integration activities.

description: Workshop covering various scholarships, eligibility criteria, and tips on crafting successful applications.

description: Program promoting cultural exchange and language learning between international and domestic students.
